controls.requirement: Lawfulness, fairness and transparency - Personal data must be processed lawfully, fairly and in a transparent manner
verification_points: Legal basis documented for each processing activity
Privacy notices provided to data subjects
Processing activities are fair and non-deceptive

controls.requirement: Purpose limitation - Data collected for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes only
verification_points: No further processing incompatible with original purpose

controls.requirement: Data minimization - Personal data must be adequate, relevant and limited to what is necessary
verification_points: Regular review of data collection practices
Justification documented for each data element

controls.requirement: Accuracy - Personal data must be accurate and kept up to date
verification_points: Mechanism for data subjects to correct data

controls.requirement: Storage limitation - Data retained only as long as necessary for stated purposes
Integrity and confidentiality - Appropriate security measures to protect personal data
Valid legal basis established for processing (consent, contract, legal obligation, vital interests, public task, or legitimate interests)
verification_points: Legal basis identified for each processing activity

controls.requirement: Valid consent must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous
Processing of special category data prohibited unless specific condition met
verification_points: Explicit consent or other valid condition documented

controls.requirement: Provide transparent information and communication to data subjects
verification_points: Privacy notices in clear, plain language
Information provided in concise, accessible format
Response to data subject requests within timeframe

controls.requirement: Information provided when personal data collected from data subject
verification_points: Identity and contact details of controller

controls.requirement: Right of access - Data subjects can obtain confirmation and copy of their personal data
verification_points: Process to verify identity of requestor
Ability to provide copy of data within 1 month

controls.requirement: Right to rectification - Data subjects can request correction of inaccurate data
verification_points: Process to receive and action rectification requests
Third parties notified of corrections where applicable

controls.requirement: Right to erasure (right to be forgotten) - Data subjects can request deletion under certain conditions
verification_points: Process to evaluate and action deletion requests
Complete removal from all systems verified

controls.requirement: Right to restriction of processing
verification_points: Mechanism to restrict processing upon request
Data marked or segregated when restricted

controls.requirement: Right to data portability - Receive personal data in structured, commonly used format
verification_points: Ability to export data in structured format (JSON, CSV, XML)
Direct transfer to another controller where feasible

controls.requirement: Right to object to processing including direct marketing
verification_points: Clear opt-out mechanism for direct marketing
Right to object explicitly brought to attention

controls.requirement: Right not to be subject to solely automated decision-making including profiling
verification_points: Logic and significance explained to data subjects

controls.requirement: Controller responsibility - Implement appropriate technical and organizational measures
Data protection by design and by default
Written data processing agreements with processors
Records of processing activities maintained
Implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures
verification_points: Encryption of personal data at rest and in transit

controls.requirement: Notify supervisory authority of data breach within 72 hours
Notify data subjects of high-risk breaches without undue delay
Conduct Data Protection Impact Assessment (DPIA) for high-risk processing
verification_points: Risks to rights and freedoms evaluated

controls.requirement: Designate Data Protection Officer when required
verification_points: DPO involved in data protection matters
DPO reports to highest management level

controls.requirement: Lawful basis for transfers of personal data to third countries
verification_points: Adequacy decision or appropriate safeguards in place
Standard Contractual Clauses signed where applicable

version: 2017 TSC with 2022 Revised Points of Focus

controls.requirement: Organization demonstrates commitment to integrity and ethical values
verification_points: Code of conduct established and communicated
Expectations for integrity and ethics set by board and management
Deviations from code of conduct evaluated and addressed

controls.requirement: Board demonstrates independence and exercises oversight
verification_points: Board or equivalent oversight structure exists
Oversight of system design and operations

controls.requirement: Management establishes structure, authority, and responsibilities
Organization demonstrates commitment to competence
Organization holds individuals accountable for responsibilities
verification_points: Incentives and disciplinary actions in place

controls.requirement: Organization obtains or generates relevant quality information
verification_points: Relevant data sources identified and accessed

controls.requirement: Organization internally communicates information necessary to support functioning of internal control
Organization communicates with external parties regarding matters affecting internal control
Organization specifies objectives with sufficient clarity
verification_points: Service commitments and system requirements defined

controls.requirement: Organization identifies and analyzes risk
verification_points: Risks analyzed for likelihood and impact

controls.requirement: Organization considers potential for fraud in risk assessment
Organization identifies and assesses changes that could significantly impact the system
Organization selects, develops, and performs ongoing or separate evaluations
Organization evaluates and communicates deficiencies
Organization selects and develops control activities
verification_points: Control activities contribute to risk mitigation
Mix of preventive and detective controls

controls.requirement: Organization selects and develops general controls over technology
Organization deploys control activities through policies and procedures
Organization implements logical access security to protect information assets
Organization implements controls to prevent or detect and act upon introduction of unauthorized or malicious software
Organization authorizes, modifies, or removes access to data, software, and other protected information assets
Organization restricts physical access to facilities and protected information assets
Organization discontinues logical and physical protections when access to protected information is no longer required
verification_points: Access rights removed when no longer needed

controls.requirement: Organization implements logical access security measures to protect against threats from sources outside boundaries
Organization restricts transmission, movement, and removal of information
Organization implements controls to prevent or detect and act upon unauthorized access
Organization ensures changes to system components are authorized, designed, tested, and deployed
verification_points: Segregation of duties in change process

controls.requirement: Organization monitors system and takes action to maintain alignment with objectives
Organization evaluates security events to determine if they could impact the system
Organization responds to identified security incidents
Organization identifies, develops, and implements activities to recover from disruptions
Organization authorizes, designs, develops, configures, documents, tests, approves, and implements changes
Organization identifies, selects, and develops risk mitigation activities for identified risks
Organization assesses and manages risks associated with vendors and business partners
Organization maintains, monitors, and evaluates current processing capacity
Organization authorizes, designs, develops, implements, operates, approves, maintains, and monitors environmental protections
Organization authorizes, designs, develops, implements, operates, approves, maintains, and monitors for processing integrity
Organization obtains or generates quality data and processes it to meet objectives
Organization implements policies and procedures for complete, accurate, and timely processing
Organization creates and maintains records of system processing
Organization identifies and maintains confidential information
Organization disposes of confidential information to meet objectives
Organization provides notice to data subjects about privacy practices
Organization communicates choices available regarding collection, use, retention, and disclosure
Organization collects personal information to meet objectives
Organization limits use, retention, and disposal of personal information
Organization grants data subjects access to their personal information
Organization discloses personal information to third parties with consent
Organization maintains accurate, complete, and relevant personal information
Organization implements controls to meet privacy objectives
Security Management Process - Implement policies and procedures to prevent, detect, contain, and correct security violations
Assigned Security Responsibility - Identify security official responsible for security policies
Workforce Security - Implement policies for workforce access authorization and supervision
Information Access Management - Implement policies for authorizing access to ePHI
Security Awareness and Training - Implement security awareness program for workforce
Security Incident Procedures - Implement procedures to respond to security incidents
Contingency Plan - Establish procedures for responding to emergencies
Evaluation - Perform periodic evaluation of security measures
Business Associate Contracts - Obtain satisfactory assurances from business associates
verification_points: Written BAA with all business associates
Annual certification from BA on technical safeguards

controls.requirement: Facility Access Controls - Limit physical access to electronic information systems
Workstation Use - Implement policies for workstation functions and security
Workstation Security - Implement physical safeguards for workstations
verification_points: Secure areas for workstations with ePHI

controls.requirement: Device and Media Controls - Implement policies for disposal and reuse of hardware and media
Access Control - Implement technical policies limiting access to authorized persons
Audit Controls - Implement hardware, software, and procedures to record and examine activity
verification_points: Audit logs capture ePHI access and changes

controls.requirement: Integrity - Implement policies to ensure ePHI is not improperly altered or destroyed
Person or Entity Authentication - Verify identity before granting access
verification_points: At least two authentication factors required

controls.requirement: Transmission Security - Implement technical security for ePHI transmitted over networks
verification_points: Secure protocols for all ePHI transmission

controls.requirement: Written Documentation of All Security Policies and Procedures
verification_points: All security policies documented in writing

controls.requirement: Technology Assets Inventory and Network Diagram
verification_points: Complete inventory of technology assets maintained
Network architecture diagram created and maintained

controls.requirement: Annual Penetration Testing
Encryption of ePHI at Rest and in Transit
Notice of Privacy Practices - Provide notice to individuals about privacy practices
Individual Rights - Right to access PHI within 15-30 days
Minimum Necessary - Limit PHI use and disclosure to minimum necessary
Uses and Disclosures - Obtain authorization for uses beyond treatment, payment, operations
Breach Notification to Individuals - Notify affected individuals within 60 days
verification_points: Substitute notice if contact info unavailable

controls.requirement: Breach Notification to HHS - Report breaches affecting 500+ individuals immediately
verification_points: Breaches of 500+ reported without unreasonable delay
